definition: to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge
to cut/to slash/to scratch (cut into the surface of sth)/to strike (a match)
to row/to paddle/profitable/worth (the effort)/it pays (to do sth)
to delimit/to transfer/to assign/to plan/to draw (a line)/stroke of a Chinese character

sentences.english: We should start to see the effect of these programs during the next five-year plan.
sentences.chinese: 我们应该在下一个五年计划中看到这些项目的效果。

sentences.english: Beijing is already taking such measures under its five-year economic plan.
sentences.chinese: 中国政府已经在其经济发展五年计划采取了此类措施。

sentences.english: That's officially spelt out in the latest five-year plan.
sentences.chinese: 这在最新的五年计划里都正式阐明了。

sentences.english: The Ninth Five-Year Plan was one of the best accomplished five-year plans.
sentences.chinese: “九五”计划是完成最好的五年计划之一。

sentences.english: The mayor had the Ninth Five-Year Plan drafted.
sentences.chinese: 市长让人起草了第九个五年计划。

sentences.english: They doped out a five-year plan.
Over the next five years, low-end industries will be moving out of China.
sentences.chinese: 在下个五年计划里，低端产业将会被迁出中国。

sentences.english: He is helping the coach ready for the five-year plan of our team.
sentences.chinese: 帮助教练给我们队拟定一个五年计划。

sentences.english: The paper has it that our sixth five-year plan was overfulfilled.
sentences.chinese: 报纸上说我们第六个五年计划已经超额完成了。

sentences.english: 1996 was the first year of China's 9th Five-Year Plan.
sentences.chinese: 1996年是我国第九个五年计划的第一年。

sentences.english: What are the key business goals and visions charted for the next three to five years?
sentences.chinese: 为未来三至五年计划的主要业务目标和远景是什么？

sentences.english: China's 'five-year plans' set targets for saving energy.
sentences.chinese: 中国的“五年计划”为节约能源制定了目标。

definition: plan/project/program/to plan/to map out/CL:個|个[ge4],項|项[xiang4]

Deng Xiaoping's four modernizations practiced from the 1980s (possibly planned together with Zhou Enlai), namely: modernization of industry, agriculture, national defense and science and technology/abbr. to 四化
